mapper.select: select tbl_place.Code_ID codeID,tbl_place.Place_ID placeID,tbl_place.Place_Title title, tbl_place.Place_Rating rating, tbl_place.Place_View_Cnt placeViewCnt, tbl_place.Place_Review_Cnt placeReviewCnt, tbl_place_detail.Place_Location location, tbl_place_detail.Place_Time time, tbl_place_detail.Place_Contents contents, tbl_place_detail.Place_Tel tel from tbl_place NATURAL JOIN tbl_place_detail where tbl_place.Place_ID = #{placeID}
mapper.update: update tbl_place set Place_View_Cnt = Place_View_Cnt + 1 where Place_ID = #{placeID}
mapper.select: select Code_ID codeID, Place_ID placeID, Place_Title title, Place_Rating rating, Place_View_Cnt placeViewCnt, Place_Review_Cnt placeReviewCnt from tbl_place where Place_ID > 0 order by Place_ID desc limit #{startNum}, #{contentsPerPage}
select count(Place_ID) from tbl_place where Place_ID > 0
